tooltip.total-balance: The total value your funds on the platform.
tooltip.available: Your funds that are currently available for investment.
tooltip.invested: The funds that are currently invested in programs and / or funds. Invested GVT shows investment in funds. Invested USDT includes Forex.
tooltip.trading: Current market value of your investments in your programs, funds and trading accounts, taking into account the profit/loss of open positions.
tooltip.pending: Funds that are still being processed.
tooltip.transactions: Operation of funds transferring to/from or between wallets.
tooltip.deposit: A transaction involving a transfer of funds to another party.
tooltip.withdrawals: A transaction of taking funds out of the account.
tooltip.deposit-button: Send cryptocurrency from an external wallet address to your Genesis Vision Wallet address. The following cryptocurrencies are supported: BTC, ETH, USDT and GVT.
tooltip.withdrawal-button: Send cryptocurrency from your GV Wallet address to an external wallet address.
tooltip.transfer-button: Convert cryptocurrency within your GV Wallet between BTC, ETH, USDT and GVT
tooltip.buy-with-card: Purchase cryptocurrencies with a credit card and deposit them directly to your GVT Wallet. The following cryptocurrencies are supported: BTC, ETH and USDT.

buttons.internal-transfer: Convert cryptocurrency within your GV Wallet between BTC, ETH, USDT and GVT
buttons.deposit: Send cryptocurrency from an external wallet address to your Genesis Vision Wallet address. The following cryptocurrencies are supported: BTC, ETH, USDT and GVT.
buttons.withdraw: Send cryptocurrency from your GV Wallet address to an external wallet address.

alert-messages.resend-email-success: A withdrawal confirmation letter was resent to your email address.
alert-messages.cancel-request-success: The withdrawal request was successfully cancelled.

bnb-popup-text.withdrawal: ⚠️ Please ensure that the withdrawal address supports the Binance Smart Chain network (BSC). You will loose your assets if your chosen platform does not support BSC.
bnb-popup-text.deposit: ⚠️ Please ensure that you are using Binance Smart Chain network (BSC) when depositing BNB to this address. You will loose your assets if you do not chose the correct network.
